elements.name: Intro
elements.html:
CSF Facilitator Summit Post Survey

We are interested in learning about all facilitators' experiences during Day 2 of the 2021 Summit. Your responses will be shared anonymously with Code.org staff and co-leads running these workshops to help inform summits and other professional learning opportunities in the future. Thank you for taking a few minutes to complete this survey!

elements.name: co_leads
elements.title: Which cohort are you in? Please visit http://bit.ly/2021-csf-digital-digest if you are unsure.

elements.name: iFeel
elements.title: I feel more prepared to lead Code.org's CS Fundamentals Professional Learning workshops in 2021-22 than I did before today.

elements.name: describe_equity
elements.title: I can describe how equity is supported throughout the CS Fundamentals workshops.

elements.name: equity_strategies
elements.title: I can describe strategies I will use to support equity in CS Fundamentals workshops.

elements.name: practices_strengthen
elements.title: I can identify facilitation practices I need to strengthen in support of leading high-quality, equity-focused CS workshops.

elements.name: useful_practice
elements.title: What was the most useful thing you learned today and why?

elements.name: today_engaging
elements.title: Overall, to what extent did you find the activities today engaging?

elements.name: most_engaging
elements.title: What was most engaging for you today?

elements.name: least_engaging
elements.title: What was least engaging for you today?

elements.name: connected_community
elements.title: Overall, to what extent are you feeling connected to the facilitator community after this event?

elements.name: event_experience
elements.title: To what extent has your experience at this event supported your understanding of the role and opportunity you have as a Code.org facilitator to support equity in your workshops?

elements.name: commitment_equity
elements.title: During this event, we asked you to identify a commitment you are making as a facilitator this year in support of equity. Please share that commitment here.

elements.name: anything_else
elements.title: If there is anything you would like us to know, please use this space to share.

elements.name: permission
elements.title: I give Code.org permission to quote my written feedback from today for use on social media, promotional materials, and other communications.

choices.text: Yes, I give Code.org permission to quote me
No, I do not give Code.org my permission.

elements.name: question2
elements.html: Thank you for sharing your responses! If you have any questions about this survey, please contact facilitators@code.org.
